title: Do You Think He Can Stop Cheating
itunes:title: Do You Think He Can Stop Cheating
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I can’t trust anybody these days, so I’m coming to you for advice. Four years ago, my husband and I were married and we relocated to the city he grew up in, so he could be closer to his family. I didn’t know anyone in the city, but my best friend lived 30 minutes away, so that was good enough for me because she came to visit me often. A year after I got married, I got pregnant and that’s when my husband started cheating on me..........

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I can’t trust anybody these days, so I’m coming to you for advice. Four years ago, my husband and I were married and we relocated to the city he grew up in, so he could be closer to his family. I didn’t know anyone in the city, but my best friend lived 30 minutes away, so that was good enough for me because she came to visit me often. A year after I got married, I got pregnant and that’s when my husband started cheating on me..........
